passive.title: Burning Rhythm
passive.desc: Each swap Enfuego makes deals 4 damage for each swap he has made so far this turn.

core.title: Fiery Fandango
core.desc: Deal 30/50/80 damage to your opponent, force them to discard 0/1/2 hexes, and inflict 2/4/7 random tiles with burning. Deal 20 additional damage when consuming a fire match.

spell1.title: Baila!
spell1.desc: Both players draw two hexes. Perform a swap.

spell2.title: Incinerate
spell2.desc: Drag target up to 6 burning tiles, destroying them and dealing 35 damage for each destroyed.

spell3.title: Hot Potatoes
spell3.desc: Place a 3-turn debuff on your opponent that causes them to take 3 additional damage whenever they take damage for each tile in their hand.

signature.title: White-Hot Combination Kick
signature.desc: Destroy 3 tiles, dealing 70 damage for each tile destroyed. Any fire tiles destroyed this way inflict burning on 4 random adjacent tiles. Any muscle tiles destroyed this way cause your opponent to discard 1 hex.
